name: bmichaelsen
description:
This colorscheme matches the PrettyBlueish
Gtk-theme and the Purplehaze Fluxbox-theme
It is based on the Zellner colorscheme maintained by Ron Aaron <ronaharon at yahoo.com>
Kudos to him, I just did some minor modifications.
Maybe someone will find this useful.
Screenshots with GTK-Vim and vim in xterm:
http://michaelsen.kicks-ass.net/bjoern/vimscreen2.png
http://michaelsen.kicks-ass.net/bjoern/vimscreen1.png (big)
install_details:
(linux users:) copy the file to /usr/share/vim/vim62/colors/bmichaelsen.vim and put
:colorscheme bmichaelsen
into your ~/.vimrc
